title: Bedroom  in shared flat in Paris Center
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


Bedroom  in shared flat in Paris Center. Available now
In a 90m2 Flat  ( five separate bedrooms) 
Fully equipped, sheets and towel furnished 
13 m2 Bedroom with large bed = 580/month , (+ 50 for electricity, heater, taxes, wifi) 
large American kitchen fully equipped: oven , two fridges, and washing machine
Shared bathroom with shower  
Gare du nord / Poissonnière Area is very central, near buses, train stations and metros, full of bars and night life  
Deposit: one month
candidates ,  
around 20/35 years old, 
English speakers, students or young workers, welcome!
Already in the flat, 4 students/ young workers  girls. 2 from Italy,1 from UK, 1 from Peru.
